channel.title: friends on Angela Infanta
channel.description: Recent content in friends on Angela Infanta

item.title: Happy Birthday Julie!
item.description: Happy Birthday to Youâ€¦(2) Happy Birthday dear Julie Happy Birthday to You During initial Engineering blues, I hoped to get a good crew, I had a glimpse when I met you, That you’d be part of it too! And now that we have walked through, By the four different avenues, I wish the best for you, In your future endeavors too! May Deloitte be great to you, For your work life break through,

item.title: Friends through a 4-year sail...
item.description: It’s long time that I wrote an Essay. I’ll try my best with a poem to portray. Past were the days when my parents were fed up with their career And therefore with their advice I chose to be an engineer It’s the story of my first year when I didn’t know where to start, I didn’t know how will I end, Maybe taking up Engineering was an Art And I ’ll pat myself and commend.
